attributes.additional_details: In my English Exam I wanted to use the word ‘Nextly’ to start my second paragraph and couldn’t. So I think if I had made ‘Nextly’ a word it could help more kids use better vocabulary in their exams and improve grades.

rejection.details:
The Government isn't responsible for recognising new words.

Words become part of common parlance through regular usage, and indiviudal dictionaries will have their own tests for when they add a new word.
